headline: Brooklyn shooting suspect Frank James taken into police custody
author: Larry Celona
sentences: Frank James, 62, was named by cops as the sole person of interest after a man in a gas mask, helmet, and neon construction vest threw two smoke grenades and opened fire on straphangers while riding the Manhattan-bound N train just before 8:30 a.m. James rented a U-Haul van linked to the attack, authorities said during a news conference on Tuesday.
The madman who opened fire on a Brooklyn subway car and left 29 injured, 10 of them shot has been taken into custody, law enforcement sources told The Post.
The suspect had posted several rambling conspiracy-laden YouTube videos, railing against the cityâ€™s mental health services ...
Headline edited to agree with update at Source.
